product.description: No matter what tricks you want to conquer, the Burton Men's Process Flying-V Snowboard is a boarders dream. Featuring the Burton Hi-Speed Quad Package, it adds performance, speed and strength to your ride. And with other features like the NEW Flying V Springload, Smooth Right, and a Sintered base, you can ride all day in confidence.
product.name: Burton Men's Process Flying-V Snowboard 2011-2012
product.features:
• Hi-Speed Quad Package: Adding performance, speed, and strength while reducing weight, with results even a novice will immediately appreciate. You will find many of our team riders on these boards.
  • The Channel: Now on more boards and evolved for greater performance, The
  • ChannelM6 has staked its claim as snowboarding's most direct connection. Focusing power through a central connection that acts as a backbone for the board's internal tech, it also lets you easily micro-adjust your stance width and angles with all binding formats including ESTT, Re:FlexT, and Disc. The upgrade to M6 means we're using a standardized hardware size that improves upon performance and ease-of-use, and allows for compatibility with select competitor bindings, making it a choice for any rider.
  • Camber: An advocate of powerful turns and poppy precision, camber speaks to the core values of board design. Offering a snappy suspension, camber distributes weight evenly over the entire length of the board allowing for smooth, continuous edge control from tip
  • SPRINGLOADED: NEW Flying VT
  • SHAPE: Twin-Like
  • FLEX: Directional
  • CORE: Super Fly® with DualzoneT EGDT
  • FIBERGLASS: TriaxT
  • BASE: Sintered
  • SIDEWALLS: 10:45T
  • EXTRAS: Smooth RideT, Jumper Cables, Scoop, Frostbite Edges, Pro-TipT, Infinite RideT
  • Burton

product.description: Designed specifically with the avid soccer enthusiast in mind, Puma® introduces the Men's PowerCat 1.12 Tech T-Shirt. Constructed with powerful cut lines and durable fabrics, this soccer top offers a comfortable, ergonomic fit to complement your active lifestyle. With a double-bound collar and embroidered logo detailing, this top is built to perform on the field and beyond.
product.name: Puma Men's PowerCat 1.12 Tech T-Shirt
product.features:
• Designed specifically for the avid soccer enthusiast
  • Powerful cut lines and durable, engineered fabrics
  • Embroidered Puma® Cat on right chest and both sleeves
  • Double bound collar
  • Ergonomic fit
  • Fabric: 65% polyester; 35% cotton
  • Style: 653410
  • Puma

product.description: The Field & Stream ® Men's Cast Lite Tech Shirt is perfect for a day of warm weather fishing. Designed with Stretch Dobby polyester, it flexes as you move so you can comfortably reel in the catch of the day. The vented back, moisture wicking technology, and quick-drying fabric work together to keep you cool and dry while built-in UPF 30+ protects you from the sun's harmful UV rays.
product.name: Field & Stream Men's Cast Lite Tech Shirt
product.features:
• Vented back
  • UPF 30+ UV protection
  • Classic button up, collared short sleeve shirt
  • Front pocket details
  • Lightweight construction
  • Moisture wicking strength
  • Stretch Dobby fabric enhances mobility
  • Quick drying
  • Fabric: 100% polyester
  • Style: MFA00145
  • Field & Stream
